articles.title: Jio, Airtel want govt to revisit net neutrality rules to reap 5G benefits - The Economic Times
articles.description: Ultra-Reliable Low Latency Communications (URLLC) under 5G ensures more efficient scheduling of data transfers, achieving shorter transmissions through a larger subcarrier, and even allows scheduling of overlapping transmissions.

articles.title: IBC reform: Insolvency set to get a new lift - The Economic Times
articles.description: In a significant policy shift, the IBBI on Friday took the first step towards institutionalisation of the profession of Insolvency Professional (IP) by amending the regulations incorporated and enacted in 2016.
